mapper.insert: insert into hotel (name, type, address, phone, star, description, min_price, max_price, facilities_id, rooms) values (#{name}, #{type}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{star}, #{description}, #{minPrice}, #{maxPrice}, #{facilitiesId}, #{rooms})
mapper.select: select id, name, type, address, phone, star, description, min_price, max_price, facilities_id, rooms, reg_dt, mod_dt from hotel
select id, name, type, address, phone, star, description, min_price, max_price, facilities_id, rooms, reg_dt, mod_dt from hotel where id = #{hotelId}
select id, name, type, address, phone, star, description, min_price, max_price, facilities_id, rooms, reg_dt, mod_dt from hotel where address like concat('%', #{location}, '%')

select id, name, type, address, phone, star, description, min_price, max_price, facilities_id, rooms, reg_dt, mod_dt from hotel
and min_price <= #{price} and max_price >= #{price}
mapper.update:
update hotel set
name = #{name},
type = #{type},
